auth._context_mfa_required: Page heading shown when user must complete MFA to proceed
auth.mfa_verification_required: MFA verification required to access your account
auth._context_complete_mfa_verification: Primary button text to submit MFA verification

security._README: ⚠️ SECURITY-CRITICAL: Messages prevent information disclosure. See src/locales/SECURITY-TRANSLATION-GUIDE.md
security.authentication_failed: Authentication failed. Please verify your credentials and try again.
security.rate_limited: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
security.session_expired: Session expired. Please log in again.
security.recovery_code_not_found: Recovery code not found. Please verify you entered it correctly.
security.recovery_code_used: This recovery code has already been used. Each code can only be used once.
security.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
security.internal_error: An error occurred. Please try again.

_meta._purpose: These messages follow OWASP/NIST guidelines to prevent information disclosure. Translations MUST maintain generic wording to prevent credential enumeration and timing attacks. Never reveal: which credential failed, precise timing, account existence, or attack progress.

authentication_failed.security_note: MUST NOT reveal which credential failed (password, OTP, or recovery code). This prevents attackers from determining valid credentials or enumerating accounts.
authentication_failed.owasp_ref: ASVS 2.2.2 - Authentication failure responses must be generic

rate_limited.security_note: MUST NOT reveal precise lockout duration, attempt counts, or remaining attempts. This prevents timing attacks and progress tracking.
rate_limited.owasp_ref: ASVS 2.2.1 - Account lockout must not be timing-based enumerable

session_expired.security_note: Safe to indicate session issue as it doesn't reveal credential information. Helps users understand they need to re-authenticate.

recovery_code_not_found.security_note: Safe to indicate recovery code context as user explicitly selected this authentication method. Does not reveal whether code exists.

recovery_code_used.security_note: Safe expected behavior message. Users need to know recovery codes are single-use to prevent confusion.

MUST_translate_as: Generic rate limit message (no precise timing)
_translation_guidelines.WHY: These restrictions prevent attackers from: (1) determining valid usernames/emails, (2) knowing which credential to focus attacks on, (3) conducting timing attacks, (4) measuring attack progress

_safe_information.format_requirements: Safe to specify format rules (e.g., 'OTP must be 6 digits')
_safe_information.expected_behavior: Safe to describe how features work (e.g., 'Codes expire every 30 seconds')
_safe_information.recovery_options: Safe to offer alternatives (e.g., 'Use a recovery code instead')
_safe_information.general_guidance: Safe to provide help (e.g., 'Check your authenticator app')

magicLink.title: Takiuru mā te Īmēra
magicLink.description: Ka tukuna e mātou he hononga takiuru haumaru ki a koe
magicLink.sentTo: I tuku mātou i tētahi hononga takiuru ki {email}
magicLink.linkExpiresIn: Ka pau tēnei hononga i roto i te 15 meneti
magicLink.noPasswordNeeded: Kāore e hiahiatia he kupuhipa — pāwhiritia noa te hononga i tō īmēra
magicLink.requestFailed: I rahua te tuku hononga takiuru. Tēnā ngana anō.
magicLink.loginFailed: I rahua te takiuru. Tēnā ngana anō.
magicLink.signingYouIn: Kei te takiuru i a koe...
magicLink.pleaseWait: Tēnā taihoa i a mātou e whakaū ana i tō hononga

webauthn.notSupported: Kāore te whakaūnga pūāhua koiora e tautokohia i tēnei pūtirotiro

webauthn.setupSuccess: Kua whakahohea te takiuru pūāhua koiora
webauthn.setupFailed: I rahua te whakatū takiuru pūāhua koiora
webauthn.authFailed: I rahua te whakaūnga pūāhua koiora. Tēnā ngana anō.
webauthn.description: Whakamahia tō maihi-matikara, kanohi, kī haumaru rānei hei takiuru
webauthn.supportedMethods: E tautoko ana i Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello, me ngā kī haumaru

lockout.attempts-remaining: Whakatūpato: {count} ngā ngana takiuru e toe ana
lockout.account-locked: Kua raka te pūkete nā te maha o ngā ngana takiuru i rahua
lockout.locked-until: Kua raka tō pūkete tae noa ki {time}
lockout.contact-support: Whakapā ki te tautoko mēnā e hiahiatia ana te urunga tere
lockout.try-password-reset: Ka taea e koe te tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa

sessions.remove-all: Takiputa i Ngā Wātū Kē Atu Katoa

sessions.removed-all-success: Kua takiputa ngā wātū kē atu katoa

mfa.title: Whakaūnga Pūāhua-Rua
mfa.setup-description: Tāpiri i tētahi papa haumaru tāpiri ki tō pūkete
mfa.scan-qr: Kamera i tēnei waehere QR ki tō taupānga whakaū
mfa.manual-entry: Tāuru rānei i tēnei waehere ā-ringa
mfa.verify-code: Tāuru i te waehere 6-mati mai i tō taupānga
mfa.code-required: E hiahiatia ana te waehere whakaū
mfa.invalid-code: Waehere muhu. Ka pau ngā waehere ia 30 hēkona. Whakamātau i te waehere hou rawa atu mai i tō taupānga whakaū.
mfa.require-password: Tāuru tō kupuhipa hei monoki i te 2FA
mfa.password-reason: Whakaū i tō tuakiri hei whakarerekē i ngā tautuhinga whakaūnga pūāhua-rua
mfa.cancel: Whakakore me te hoki ki te takiuru
mfa.loading-status: Kei te uta i te tūnga MFA...
mfa.protected-description: Kua tiakina tō pūkete ki te whakaūnga pūāhua-rua
mfa.enable-description: Tiaki i tō pūkete ki tētahi papa haumaru tāpiri
mfa.benefit-unauthorized: Ārai i te urunga kore mana ahakoa he hē tō kupuhipa
mfa.benefit-apps: Ka mahi tahi me Google Authenticator, Authy, me ētahi atu taupānga TOTP
mfa.benefit-recovery: Ngā waehere whakaora taraki mō te urunga ohotata
mfa.supported-apps: Whakamahi i Google Authenticator, Authy, tētahi taupānga TOTP rānei
mfa.enter-code-description: Tāuru i te waehere 6-mati mai i tō taupānga whakaū
mfa.enter-recovery-code: Tāuru tētahi o ō waehere whakaora
mfa.recovery-code-mode-active: Kei te hohe te aratau waehere whakaora
mfa.otp-mode-active: Kei te hohe te aratau waehere whakaū
mfa.enter-all-digits: Tēnā tāuru i ngā mati 6 katoa kia haere tonu

recovery-codes.title: Ngā Waehere Whakaora
recovery-codes.description: Tiaki i ēnei waehere ki tētahi wāhi haumaru. Ka taea te whakamahi kotahi ia waehere mēnā ka ngaro tō urunga ki tō taupānga whakaū.
recovery-codes.warning: Ka whakaatuhia ēnei waehere kotahi anake
recovery-codes.generate-new-warning: Ka whakakorehia e tēnei ngā waehere whakaora tīari katoa
recovery-codes.copied: Kua tāruatia ngā waehere ki te papatopenga
recovery-codes.remaining: {count} ngā waehere whakaora e toe ana
recovery-codes.none-remaining: Kāore he waehere whakaora e toe ana
recovery-codes.generate-success: Kua hangaia ngā waehere whakaora hou
